mean_cn: adj. 奇异的，珍奇的，来自异国的
mean_en: from or in another country, especially a tropical one; seeming exciting and unusual because it is connected with foreign countries
sentence: I have never seen those exotic flowers before.
sentence_trans: 我过去从未见过这些奇异的花朵。
word_etyma: exo外部的，外面 + tic形容词后缀 → 从外面来的 → 来自异国的
